data.title: Booking Info for Speaking Engagements
data.meta_description: Biography of Feargal Sharkey. Find fees and other booking information for Feargal Sharkey speaking engagements and appearances at live and virtual events.
data.text:
Feargal Sharkey is a renowned Irish singer and environmental activist, best known for his role as the lead vocalist of the punk rock/new wave band The Undertones. Sharkey's career in music began in the late 1970s when The Undertones emerged as a significant force in the punk rock scene. The band's hit single "Teenage Kicks" remains an iconic anthem, praised by the legendary DJ John Peel.

Following his tenure with The Undertones, Sharkey pursued a solo career, achieving success with his eponymous debut album in 1985. The album featured the chart-topping single "A Good Heart," which showcased Sharkey's distinctive voice and solidified his reputation as a talented solo artist. Throughout his musical career, Sharkey has been known for his unique vocal style and his ability to blend punk energy with melodic pop sensibilities.

In addition to his musical achievements, Feargal Sharkey has made significant contributions to the music industry through his work in various administrative roles. He served as the Chairman of the UK Government's Live Music Forum from 2004 to 2008, advocating for the promotion and support of live music in the UK. Sharkey has also held key positions such as the Chief Executive of British Music Rights and the Chief Executive of UK Music, where he championed the rights of musicians and the importance of intellectual property.

Beyond the music industry, Sharkey is a passionate environmental advocate. He has been a vocal campaigner for the preservation and restoration of rivers and waterways in the UK. His dedication to environmental causes has earned him widespread recognition and respect, as he tirelessly works to protect natural habitats and promote sustainable practices.

Feargal Sharkey's multifaceted career, spanning music, industry leadership, and environmental activism, highlights his enduring impact and commitment to making a positive difference. His contributions continue to inspire both the music community and environmental advocates worldwide.
